SELECT PRO_NO AS O_PRO_NO, O_NO AS O_O_NO, O_NAME AS O_O_NAME FROM PRODUCT_OPT WHERE PRO_NO = #{no}

SELECT P.PRO_NO AS P_PRO_NO, P.PRO_NAME AS P_PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE AS P_PRO_PRICE, P.PRO_DATE AS P_PRO_DATE, P.PRO_MODIFY_DATE AS P_PRO_MODIFY_DATE, P.PRO_VOL AS P_PRO_VOL, P.PRO_IMG AS P_PRO_IMG, P.PRO_MODIFY_IMG AS P_PRO_MODIFY_IMG, P.PRO_INFO AS P_PRO_INFO, P.PRO_STAT AS P_PRO_STAT, P.PRO_CAT AS P_PRO_CAT, P.PRO_SOLD AS P_PRO_SOLD, P.PRO_MFG AS P_PRO_MFG, P.PRO_RATING AS P_PRO_RATING, O.PRO_NO AS O_PRO_NO, O.O_NO AS O_O_NO, O.O_NAME AS O_O_NAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_OPT O ON(P.PRO_NO = O.PRO_NO) WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( MEMBER_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_OPT, CART_QTY, CART_STAT, CART_DATE ) VALUES ( ${memberNo}, #{proNo}, #{proOptNo}, #{cartQty}, 'Y', DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT C.MEMBER_NO AS C_MEMBER_NO, C.PRO_NO AS C_PRO_NO, P.PRO_NAME AS P_PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE AS P_PRO_PRICE, C.PRO_OPT AS C_PRO_OPT, O.O_NAME AS O_O_NAME, C.CART_QTY AS C_CART_QTY, C.CART_STAT AS C_CART_STAT, P.PRO_STAT AS P_PRO_STAT, C.CART_DATE AS C_CART_DATE FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON(C.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_OPT O ON(C.PRO_OPT = O.O_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND C.CART_STAT = 'Y' AND P.PRO_STAT = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISH ( PRO_NO, WISH_STAT, MEMBER_NO, WISH_DATE ) VALUES ( #{proNo}, 'Y', #{memberNo}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT W.PRO_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE, P.PRO_RATING FROM WISH W JOIN PRODUCT P ON(W.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO) WHERE WISH_STAT = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = #{no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND WISH_STAT = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INQUIRY( PRO_NO, MEMBER_NO, INQ_NO, INQ_DATE, INQ_MOD_DATE, INQ_TITLE, INQ_CONTENT, INQ_STAT, INQ_SECRET ) VALUES ( #{proNo}, #{memberNo}, SEQ_INQNO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{inqTitle}, #{inqContent}, 'N', #{inqSecret} )
mapper.select: SELECT I.PRO_NO AS I_PRO_NO, I.MEMBER_NO AS I_MEMBER_NO, M.ID AS M_ID, I.INQ_NO AS I_INQ_NO, I.INQ_DATE AS I_INQ_DATE, I.INQ_MOD_DATE AS I_INQ_MOD_DATE, I.INQ_TITLE AS I_INQ_TITLE, I.INQ_CONTENT AS I_INQ_CONTENT, I.INQ_STAT AS I_INQ_STAT, I.INQ_SECRET AS I_INQ_SECRET FROM PRODUCT_INQUIRY I JOIN MEMBER M ON(I.MEMBER_NO = M.NO) WHERE PRO_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL( ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, DETAIL_PRO_NO, DETAIL_PRO_NAME, DETAIL_OPT, DETAIL_OPT_NAME, DETAIL_QTY, DETAIL_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{memberNo}, #{detailProNo}, #{detailProName}, #{detailOpt}, #{detailOptName}, #{detailQty}, #{detailPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, DETAIL_PRO_NO, DETAIL_PRO_NAME, DETAIL_OPT, DETAIL_QTY, DETAIL_PRICE, DETAIL_OPT_NAME FROM ORDER_DETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_STAT, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_METHOD, ORDER_PM, ORDER_POINT FROM ORDER_SUM WHERE ORDER_NO = #{no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORDER_SUM WHERE MEMBER_NO = 3 AND ORDER_STAT = '주문생성'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DELIVERY ( ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, DEL_STAT, DEL_NAME, DEL_POSTCODE, DEL_ADD, DEL_EXTRA_ADD, DEL_DETAIL_ADD, DEL_PHONE, DEL_MSG ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{memberNo}, DEFAULT, #{delName}, #{delPostcode}, #{delAdd}, #{delExtraAdd}, #{delDetailAdd}, #{delPhone}, #{delMsg} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_SUM WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ORDER_STAT != '주문생성'
SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_STAT, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_METHOD, ORDER_POINT FROM ORDER_SUM WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ORDER_STAT != '주문생성'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRO_NO, PRO_OPT, PRO_OPT_NAME, REV_DATE, REV_TITLE, REV_CONTENT, REV_RATING, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{memberNo}, #{proNo}, #{proOpt}, #{proOptName}, DEFAULT, #{revTitle}, #{revContent}, #{revRating}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.ORDER_NO AS R_ORDER_NO, R.MEMBER_NO AS R_MEMBER_NO, M.ID AS M_ID, R.PRO_NO AS R_PRO_NO, R.PRO_OPT AS R_PRO_OPT, R.REV_DATE AS R_REV_DATE, R.REV_TITLE AS R_REV_TITLE, R.REV_CONTENT AS R_REV_CONTENT, R.REV_RATING AS R_REV_RATING, R.PRO_OPT_NAME AS R_PRO_OPT_NAME, R.ORIGINAL_FILENAME AS R_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, R.RENAMED_FILENAME AS R_RENAMED_FILENAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MEMBER_NO = M.NO) WHERE PRO_NO = #{no}
SELECT PRO_NO, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME FROM PRODUCT_IMGS WHERE PRO_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLICATION ( APP_NO, MEMBER_NO, APP_NAME, APP_URL, APP_TITLE, APP_CONTENT, APP_S_NO, APP_C_NO, APP_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_APPNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{appName}, #{appUrl}, #{appTitle}, #{appContent}, 0, #{appCatNo}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_BIDDING WHERE BID_S_NO = 1
SELECT BID_NO, BID_NAME, BID_COND, BID_CURR, BID_S_NO, BID_URL, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME FROM PRODUCT_BIDDING WHERE BID_S_NO = 1
SELECT BID_NO, BID_NAME, BID_COND, BID_CURR, BID_S_NO, BID_URL, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME FROM PRODUCT_BIDDING WHERE BID_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIDDING ( BID_NO, BID_MEMBER_NO, BID_STAT ) VALUES ( #{bidNo}, #{bidMemberNo}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT DETAIL_PRO_NO, SUM(DETAIL_QTY) AS DETAIL_QTY FROM ORDER_DETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} GROUP BY DETAIL_PRO_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIDDING_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, BID_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_STAT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BID_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{bidNo}, #{boardContent}, DEFAULT, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS B_BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_NO AS B_MEMBER_NO, B.BID_NO AS B_BID_NO, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS B_BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_DATE AS B_BOARD_DATE, B.BOARD_STAT AS B_BOARD_STAT, M.ID AS M_ID FROM BIDDING_BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO) WHERE BID_NO = #{no} AND BOARD_STAT = 'Y'
